title: Dave Kennedy: The Psychological Principles of Social Engineering
description: Today on Malicious Life, tens of thousands of people get robbed.  Then a community gets together to ask: should we take our money back, or let the hacker walk with it?
content:encoded: Dave Kennedy (AKA HackingDave) is a world-famous expert on Social Engineering & author of The Social Engineering Tool Kit. Dave & Ran discuss the psychological principles behind Social Engineering, as well as Dave’s work on the hit TV show – “Mr. Robot”.
itunes:subtitle: Today on Malicious Life, tens of thousands of people get robbed.  Then a community gets together to ask: should we take our money back, or let the hacker walk with it?
itunes:summary: Today on Malicious Life, tens of thousands of people get robbed.  Then a community gets together to ask: should we take our money back, or let the hacker walk with it?
